title: Context
summary: What is the problem that we are trying to solve by the website? What details do you know about the problem? How were they doing it initially? What are the important people for your project?
before: We need to have very basic Idea about the project, having discussion with the client and knowing them would be helpful.
after: You will have clear Idea about where the project is positioned, problem it is trying to solve and insights for the next steps

key_steps.text: Write down whatever idea of the project you got from client, what problem they are trying to solve or what are their goal from the website, why do they decided their website to be designed now.
Do online research about the problem. Jot down whatever you can find about the problem, all details of it. What are the factors that take part in this, write down all the important points
Find more details about the factors that can influence your website. Any relevant information can help us on the way
